column1: Little Goat Diner////I've never seen a menu with a header entitled
column3: don't get toooooo crazy.  Cereal is a tried and true good ole' American staple.  Let's not speak blasphemy here.  I didn't have this
column4: but I love the name of the dish
column5: "Fat Elvis Waffles."  It's two simple words put together
column6: but they have SO much meaning behind them..
